verbose_text: Sodium selenite has been documented to trigger early lenticular epithelial cell damage including loss of calcium homeostasis [XREF_BIBR], crystallin protein breakdown [XREF_BIBR], loss of anti-oxidant enzyme activity, accelerated apoptosis and DNA damage.
evidence: crystallin protein breakdown [ XREF_BIBR ], loss of anti-oxidant enzyme activity, accelerated apoptosis
